title: The Story of a writer
creator_credit: Terry Sanders and David L Wolper Productions
brief_description: Portrays the life, attitudes and method of work of a creative writer. Ray Bradbury discusses his experience and views and traces the process of writing the story Dial Double Zero, which is dramatised in condensed form. Cast: Bill Joyce. Narrated by John Willis.
